name: Faizan Ahmed
content: Dr. F. Ahmed | People Pages: Find employees & contact details | University of Twente Skip to content EEMCS-CS-FMTEEMCS-SERVICES-OLDZilverling 3070faizan.ahmed@utwente.nl+31534893370Business card I am trained as a mathematician and received Ph.D. in mathematical optimization from the University of Twente. I have also obtained PDEng (now EngD)-Mathematics for Industry from the Eindhoven University of Technology; during this time, I was introduced to the world of data science. My experience and research background resulted in two research streams: Applied machine learning and mathematical optimization.OrganisationsFaculty of Electrical Engineering, Mathematics and Computer Science (EEMCS)Computer Science (EEMCS-CS)Formal Methods and Tools (EEMCS-CS-FMT)Services EEMCS (EEMCS-SERVICES)Opleidingsdirecteuren (EEMCS-SERVICES-OLD)Digital Society InstituteAncillary activitiesSaxion University of Applied SciencesDocent/onderzoekerMy primary research interest is applied machine learning for industry and healthcare, especially explainable AI. I am currently engaged in projects related to the application of machine learning for point cloud data, disease prediction/ progression, and data warehousing. Over time, mathematical optimization has become a secondary interest though it is still inspiring to see its applicability in all areas of science and engineering. PublicationsJump to: 2025 | 2024 | 2023 | 2022 | 20212025C-SHAP for time series: An approach to high-level temporal explanations (2025)[Working paper › Preprint].
